```{r}
all.data = read.csv("data/eeg/generated/eeg-subset.csv")
subject.table <- expand.grid(subject=(1:30),software=c('jspsych', 'eprime'), electrode=1:128)
read.table("data/eeg/generated/eeg-subset.csv")

#Useful for Direction
subject.table <- expand.grid(subject=(1:30),software=c('jspsych', 'eprime'), electrode=1:128)
subject.table$voltage <- rnorm(2560, 0, 1)
subject.table$code = sample(1:7680)
subject.table$code <- mapply(function(sw, el){
  code <- subset(subject.table, software==sw & electrode==el)$code
  return(code)
}, subject.table$software, subject.table$electrode)

subject.table$software <- NULL
subject.table$electrode <- NULL
```
